amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any contract or arrangement which would make the United States liable for nuclear accidents occurring in North Korea.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 106-624 to block any U.S. government entity from entering into arrangements to accept liability or extend an indemnity for nuclear accidents occurring in North Korea.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 334 - 85 (Roll no. 205).
